articles.title: DeFi Market Rattled: Could Traditional Safe Havens Like Gold and Silver Benefit?
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: The Decentralized Finance (DeFi) market is in a period of profound instability as of November 2025, marked by a series of high-impact security breaches and a palpable erosion of investor confidence. Recent incidents include a significant exploit on the Balancer protocol and the collapse of Stream Finance.
